valid: For the period 12:00 (UTC) on Fri 19 Sep 2025 to 12:00 (UTC) on Sat 20 Sep 2025
general_synopsis: Low west of Rockall 1003 expected Shannon 1010 by midday tomorrow. New low expected Wales 1006 by same time. Low Bailey 999 losing its identity
